This thread has been moved to: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98311-SDHI-derivative-with-command-pod-solar-panels-etc?p=1505314#post1505314

I love the SDHI mod, but it lacks solar panels, a more orion-ish ommand pod (the mk. 1-2 won't cut it) and a Launch Escape System. If someone could create this, that would be amazing.

Edited October 27, 2014 by SpaceLaunchSystem
